long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for the perfect tool to spy on your competitors Facebook, AdSpy and Titkok ads ? Find inspiration for your next ad campaign ? BAIZE is the solution. It allows you to aggregate ads into a single list, tag your favorite ads, get back to your list anytime and filter your saved ads by keywords, engagement creation date and more. 

- How to use BAIZE?
When visiting any of the Facebook , Tiktok or AdSpy, click the icon in the upper right corner to use.
